content: third time of the pattern chart or any row according to desired length i need a mini-gusset for my socks with the flk heel for a short row heel continue in the round working 12 after 2 5 times working the row half a pattern repeat with pattern on instep patterning i started the stitches and plain stockinette on the back of the leg the shaping of the mini gusset former sole stitches kfb at each end of sole stitches every 3rd row 4 in row 13 of the patterning start working the back of times this gave me 35 sole the leg pattern please be careful to align the front and stitches in row 24 of the back of your patterns in the corresponding row third time working the patterning i did the flk heel knit to your preferred length minus about 1 inch in on 2+1+9+11+9+1+2 stitches patterning ending with either row 12 or row 24 and then continued in the round i then got rid off the work 12 row of twisted ribbing knit through back loop 1 mini-gusset by decreasing by purl 1 start with knit through back loop ktbl on the 1 on each side 4 times in first of your instep stitches making sure to align the ktbl every 3rd row 12 row with the lone knit stitches in your pattern repeats see second pic i knit a total of three times the patterning 72 row bind off using your preferred stretchy bindoff method after turning the heel and before the ribbing weave in ends i very much like jeny s enjoy surprisingly stretchy bind off jssbo © la maison de saba 2019 autumn fires page 2 of 5 v 1 1 la maison de saba stitch pattern foot and front of leg written notes and annotations instructions 29 stitches please note the stitch count row 1 p2 yo k1 yo p3 k2 k2tog k3 p3 yo k1 yo p3 varies with the pattern you k2 k2tog k3 p2 will have a count of 29 after row 2 and all even numbered row knit the knits and row 11/12 and 23/24 purl the purls please note yo count as knit stitches row 3 p2 k1 yo k1 yo k1 p3 k2 k2tog k2 p3 k1 yo k1 yo k1 p3 k2 k2tog k2 p2 row 5 p2 k2 yo k1 yo k2 p3 k2 k2tog k1 p3 k2 yo k1 yo k2 p3 k2 k2tog k1 p2 row 7 p2 k3 yo k1 yo k3 p3 k2 k2tog p3 k3 yo k1 yo k3 p3 k2 k2tog p2 row 9 p2 k2 k2tog k5 p3 k1 k2tog p3 k2 k2tog k5 p3 k1 k2tog p2 row 11 p2 k2 k2tog k4 p3 k2tog p3 k2 k2tog k4 p3 k2tog p2 row 13 p2 k2 k2tog k3 p3 yo k1 yo p3 k2 k2tog k3 p3 yo k1 yo p2 row 15 p2 k2 k2tog k2 p3 k1 yo k1 yo k1 p3 k2 k2tog
